summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AMMO rebrand and new responsibility-focused gamification system. Backend APIs working correctly, frontend fully rebranded with proper tier system display.

fixed_bugs.issue: Still showed AEGIS branding instead of AMMO
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Updated message to show 'AMMO - Accountable Munitions & Mobility Oversight API'

minor_issues.impact: Low - new responsibility endpoint works correctly

design_success.success: Complete AMMO rebrand implemented with proper tagline and messaging
design_success.details: All elements show 'Accountable Munitions & Mobility Oversight' branding

design_success.success: All three tiers properly displayed with correct ranges
design_success.details: Sentinel (0-59), Guardian (60-84), Elite Custodian (85-100) all visible

design_success.success: ARI Score System, Training Leaderboard, and Tier Benefits all prominently displayed

design_success.details: All buttons redirect to proper authentication flow

passed_tests: Three tier cards with proper ranges
API root endpoint AMMO branding fix

success_percentage.backend: 95% (20/21 tests passing - only legacy gamification endpoint has minor 520 error)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All AMMO branding, tier system, and navigation working perfectly)
